name: Trick & Treat
description: Trick or treating in a vampire's house.Trick & Treat is a light-hearted Halloween adventure. It's about exploring and solving puzzles in a spooky atmosphere. There will be some horror elements, romance, many bad ends and a happy ending of true love.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ Vista/7/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A short cute casual RPG game
Really cute and spooky game!

Trick & Treat is a sweet and entertaining 8-bit RPG. The story and dialogues are rather mysterious and the various quests never get boring. If you like riddles, an halloweeny atmosphere and kawaii, tough pixel-girls, this is just for you! I enjoyed every character and the funny fact that there are several options to die in the game, as some sort of personal achievment. The combo of cute and horror fits well too, only thing bothering me was that I had to finish the game twice to unlock the achievments, because finishing it first time over your desktop won't work unless you play it over steam directly.
Loved this game! Even though the art style was a bit fuzzy, if you will, the comcept and storyline is pretty sweet! I would definatly play again!

This is a cute little RPG maker game with a Halloweeny theme. Its short and sweet, but contains some jumpscares and images of blood that may be scary to some. There are no screamers in the game however, which is a nice surprise. Its really worth spending the 2 hours or so it will take to complete the game.
